imdb.plot outline: Series will follow, Manny Pacquiao and "Sugar" Shane Mosley, through their unique preparations leading up to the year's biggest event on the boxing calendar - the forthcoming WBO welterweight championship clash and Showtime Pay-Per-View blockbuster event on May 7, 2011, from the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas.
imdb.title: Fight Camp 360o: Pacquiao vs. Mosley
akas: Fight Camp 360o: Pacquiao vs. Mosley (United States)
plot: Series will follow, Manny Pacquiao and "Sugar" Shane Mosley, through their unique preparations leading up to the year's biggest event on the boxing calendar - the forthcoming WBO welterweight championship clash and Showtime Pay-Per-View blockbuster event on May 7, 2011, from the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas.::Anonymous
